page.title: 03AUGUST PITTS FARM
page.content: August Pitts Farm This farm derives its name from a particular type of causeway made from brushwood and laid across bog or flood lands, it being at a place in the flood lands of the Vale between Yalding and Marden A modern Farmhouse built on well established land Chun Farm This farmhouse was originally two cottages with a dairy which is now the kitchen A bathroom has now been added The land comprises 20 acres Castle Hill Houses in this area range from about 1600 to modern day designs
